creator: tjsb@slb.com
text:
Java does not currently handle HTML tags of the form
properly - the trailing ">" is displayed. However, Java does handle tags of the form

OK. The patches to follow tidy up the Help display: - component_reference.xml must be valid XML, so
is replaced by

- site_printable.vsl does not need to be valid XML, nor does it need to output valid XHTML, so the the patch just removes the trailing "/" characters.

Upload of attachments does not seem to be working at present; I'll try again 
later.
